2e533790-1a1c-4798-acce-3c6ffa8164f6.name: Hibiki 21 Years Old
2e533790-1a1c-4798-acce-3c6ffa8164f6.description: A big, bold and beautiful nose of oily rum-like notes. Lightly raisinated fruit and spice drift above some lusciously creamy oak. Lovely maturity to the aromas, and very much like an old grain whisky. Superb depth with a refreshing citrus twist. The palate is quite tannic to begin with as the oak really grips. There is a depth of lightly oiled dried fruit orange peel, strawberry jam and baked apple. Smooth, subtle and fairly short finish.

d44581b2-f8d5-4c6f-b2ce-5d3e41fba64b.name: Port Cask Finish
d44581b2-f8d5-4c6f-b2ce-5d3e41fba64b.description: Vanilla, sugar and oak on the nose with hints of fruit. Beautiful palate, broad, sweet and fruity. Sweet and balanced finish.

fab86ee4-35ce-4225-8e66-6e623c169634.name: Selection Notes Fum√©es
fab86ee4-35ce-4225-8e66-6e623c169634.description: Feminine nose and surprising peaty character on the palate. Well balanced and easy to drink.

4ad3815d-da66-46b3-96d2-f8fe95761f0d.name: Black Barrel
4ad3815d-da66-46b3-96d2-f8fe95761f0d.description: Pale gold with some red tinges. Nice complexity, touches of marzipan, roasted nuts, dried fruits, red apples, fruit and nut chocolate. Sweet and fruity. Well balanced. Great complexity for a blend. Smooth and easy to drink.
